scripts.postbuild: mkdir ./game/.vuepress/dist/AzureSpaceMystery && cp -rf ./game/.vuepress/dist/assets* ./game/.vuepress/dist/AzureSpaceMystery/assets && cp -rf ./game/.vuepress/dist/fonts* ./game/.vuepress/dist/AzureSpaceMystery/fonts && cp -rf ./game/.vuepress/dist/images* ./game/.vuepress/dist/AzureSpaceMystery/images && cp -rf ./game/.vuepress/dist/rocket* ./game/.vuepress/dist/AzureSpaceMystery/rocket && cp -rf ./game/.vuepress/dist/404.html ./game/.vuepress/dist/AzureSpaceMystery/404.html && cp -rf ./game/.vuepress/dist/index.html ./game/.vuepress/dist/AzureSpaceMystery/index.html
